example.invalid
example.invalid/
http://example.invalid
http://example.com.invalid/
http://.example.com
http://-example.com
hppt://example.com
example.coma
-example.coma
foo.123
http://a.b--c.de/

_http://example.com
_//example.com
_example.com
http://example.com_

http://
http://.
http://..
http://#
http://##
http://?
http://??
google.com:500000
show image.jpg
path:to:file.pm
/path/to/file.pl

%
% Not IPv4
%
1.2.3.4.5
1.2.3
1.2.3.400
1000.2.3.4
a1.2.3.4
1.2.3.4a

%
% Not email
%
foo@bar
mailto:foo@bar
